survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction and preferences regarding subscription-based coffee delivery services to help improve service quality and offerings.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based coffee delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels for better quantitative analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based coffee delivery service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key drivers of satisfaction.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with your coffee delivery?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure frequency of issues for service improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with your coffee delivery?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your coffee subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for service enhancement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your coffee subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this coffee subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this coffee subscription service to others?
